name: Veksttre
description:
- Lore:

"Coming from a long lineage of 'Seers'

Watching over Veksttre, the Tree of Growth,

Our Protagonist faces a new evil rooting at the base of the tree

Trying to reach for the Tree’s Core, longing for its energy."

- Genre: 

First Person Puzzle

-Credits:

Robert Dibi - Game Designer & Producer

George Rashed - Co-Game Designer & Dev

Nizar Lawen - Lead Dev

Alon Amoyal - Art Director / Artist

* A Game we made in 48 Hours for the Global Game Jam of 2023.
